themes: Lack of direct support for artists' needs (equipment, disaster prep)
key_phrases: Timelines for Nexus are VERY difficult
you don't know if you have funding for an event until right before
The cycle I planned to apply for was also skipped last year
It still seems really hard to apply for anything as an individual visual artist
Everything also has to include some sort of community aspect
there should be some funding to just help artists, such as able to buy equipment, prep for disasters (like the CERF+ grant)
barriers_identified: Difficulty applying as an individual visual artist
Requirement for community aspect in all grants
solutions_proposed: Provide funding that helps artists directly (e.g., equipment, disaster prep)
Offer grants that do not require a community aspect
